client
Interface QuizClientServices

All Superinterfaces:
java.rmi.Remote, java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientApplet, SimpleClient
public interface QuizClientServices
extends java.rmi.Remote, java.io.Serializable

Author:
reinhard The client interface is used for RMI callbacks
